hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Try holding a D-pad button on the item screen.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Pocket Egg# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Arrows# can be found at #Zora's River#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Water Temple#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #the Ice Arrows# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #7# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ToT (Right).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Water Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #the Poacher's Saw#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a grotto full of #spider webs#.
